title: Lethality
body: Given how powerful AD assassin champions got when lethality got buffed; are we to expect the ratio to go back to 40:60 instead of 60:40? It kinda feels like how old armor penetration was at this point.

replies.body:
40:60 was far too weak.

While most people agreed hat 50:50 would likely be the thing to do, Riot has instead opted to simply lowering the lethality on the items a bit.
We'll have to wait and see.

Probably won't be completely reverted. Based on what is going on with this patch they are either going to roll it back a little or they will continue to slightly bump down the stronger abusers of the stat.
